reviews.content:
Its extremely buggy, specially if you have some widgets on your screen.

I hope this will have a fix soon because i bought the tweak right now
Cada que se hace el respring se borran los ajustes y tienes que volver a ajustarlo a tu gusto y eso no est√° chido.

Best homescreen manager that i found.
Nice & clear interface.
The only thing that i like to see in the next update is a folder manager with same functions & possibility to change background color-/transparency. Keep up the good work

This tweak is amazing when it works. The problem is that it keeps crashing, and the report is saying that there is no filter file for the tweak. I am relatively new to jail breaking, so it may be something on my end, but overall it is amazing.
works on unc0ver 14.3, must have if you wanna customize your home screen
